parameters.NOTE: This option only applies when deploying and running in the Talend Runtime
parameters.LABEL: COST_CENTRE
parameters.COMMENT: Fetch all the CSKS data (all the region) to populating cost_centre_language table

parameters.QUERY:
"SELECT
	COST_CENTRE_CODE,
	CONTROLLING_AREA_CODE,
	SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE,
	VALID_TO_DATE
FROM "+context.cdrConnectionReadWrite_Database+"."+ context.cdrCostCentreVersionTableName +" WHERE SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE='"+context.cdrSapSourceSystemCode+"'"
parameters.NOTE: This option only applies when deploying and running in the Talend Runtime
parameters.LABEL: COST_CENTRE_VERSION

parameters.NOTE: This option only applies when deploying and running in the Talend Runtime
parameters.LABEL: LANGUAGE

parameters.QUERY:
"SELECT 
COST_CENTRE_CODE,
CONTROLLING_AREA_CODE,
LANGUAGE_CODE,
SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE,
ETL_MD5_CHECKSUM,
ETL_SOURCE_CSKT_LAST_UPDATED_DATE
FROM "+context.cdrCostCentreLanguageTableName +" WHERE SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE='"+context.cdrSapSourceSystemCode+"'"
parameters.NOTE: This option only applies when deploying and running in the Talend Runtime
parameters.LABEL: COST_CENTRE_LANGUAGE

parameters.NOTE_CUSTOMER:
Please note:
(1) Nullable setting in this table is more preferential than the default schema.
(2) Length checking is base on the value of the default schema.
parameters.NOTE_CHECK_ANOTHER: Please note: only index matching, for example, the second column of checking schema is correspond to the second of input schema
parameters.NOTE_SUB_STRING: If exceed, either trim the field when above option checked or reject the row.
parameters.INFO:
If only one column has error, the errCode value is a summation of all error code; else the errCode is 16:
(1) Type discrepancy (include wrong date pattern): 2
(2) Empty or NULL: 4
(3) Length/Precision Error: 8

parameters.QUERY:
"SELECT COST_CENTRE_CODE,CONTROLLING_AREA_CODE,SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE FROM  " + context.cdrConnectionReadWrite_Database + "." + context.cdrCostCentreTableName +
" WHERE ETL_IS_DELETED_FLG = 1 AND SAP_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE='"+context.cdrSapSourceSystemCode+"'"
